content_parts.title: Features
_jql: project = XT AND issuetype in (Epic, Story) AND 'X3 Release Note Status' in ('Communicated, Validated by PO/PM','Review Done') AND 'X3 Release Note Grouping' = 'Common' AND (statusCategory in (Done) OR status = 'Release Candidate') AND (resolution is EMPTY OR resolution in (Delivered, Done)) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Epic Type' not in (Internal, Research) AND 'X3 Epic Type' = New AND fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2025 R3 (52.0.0)")

content_parts.content: A Reply to tab was added to the Email domain sender page. For a nominated package, you can add a reply-to email address for each type of sales and purchasing document issued from a specific company and site.

content_parts.title: Resolved issues
_jql: project = XT AND issuetype = Bug AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('To be communicated') AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('Validated by PO') AND 'X3 Product Area' = 'Common' AND status in (Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND (fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2025 R3 (52.0.0)") OR issueFunction in linkedIssuesOf("issueFunction in x3FindContentsOfImagefixes(\"XT 2025 R3 (52.0.0)\")", "is hotfix of")) AND issue not in (XT-89843,XT-89728,XT-89384,XT-88212)

content_parts.content: On the Job schedule page, you can schedule when MRP synchronizes with your bill of material records without specifying the data type to synchronize.

content_parts.title: Creating routings with the authorization service option enabled

content_parts.content: An authorized user can create routings without needing to be an admin user.

content_parts.title: Features
_jql: project = XT AND issuetype in (Epic, Story) AND 'X3 Release Note Status' in ('Communicated, Validated by PO/PM','Review Done') AND 'X3 Release Note Grouping' = 'Distribution' AND (statusCategory in (Done) OR status = 'Release Candidate') AND (resolution is EMPTY OR resolution in (Delivered, Done)) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Epic Type' not in (Internal, Research) AND 'X3 Epic Type' = New AND fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2025 R3 (52.0.0)")

content_parts.title: Sales invoice and sales credit memo Payments tab

content_parts.content: A Payments tab was added to the Sales invoice and Sales credit memo pages, and the Payment term and Due date fields were moved from the Information tab to the new tab. A link to the Accounts receivable open item page is available on the tab if you do not use Sage Intacct.

You asked. We listened.

Efficiently track and manage receipt information in one place with the Purchase receipt line inquiry.

The inquiry is available:

  • From the Purchasing > Purchasing inquiries menu
  • From the Purchase order line inquiry page, which enables access to receipt lines related to a specific purchase order line.

On the AP Automation configuration page, you can set up your Customer ID with Sage AI and the Incoming accounts payable email address you can share with suppliers for a tenant and a company.
From the Uploaded purchasing documents page, you can select the Technical information action to display technical records for troubleshooting. You can also delete uploaded documents, which delete from your solution and from the Sage AI service.

content_parts.title: Improvements
_jql: project = XT AND ((issuetype in (Epic, Story) AND 'X3 Release Note Status' in ('Communicated, Validated by PO/PM','Review Done') AND 'X3 Release Note Grouping' = 'Distribution' AND (statusCategory in (Done) OR status = 'Release Candidate') AND (resolution is EMPTY OR resolution in (Delivered, Done)) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Epic Type' not in (Internal, Research) AND 'X3 Epic Type' = Improvement) OR (issuetype = Bug AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('To be communicated') AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('Validated by PO') AND 'X3 Product Area' = 'Distribution' AND status in (Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Behaviour Change' = Yes)) AND fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2025 R3 (52.0.0)")

content_parts.content:
Authorization
Only authorized users can view the Stock in transit inquiry page.

Serial numbers
For consistency and traceability, when you enter stock details on stock transfer receipts you can select serial numbers from corresponding stock transfer shipments.

You asked. We listened.

Main list row actions

To save time, you can perform key actions such as Duplicate and Delete from the main list.

Main list additional columns

In the main list, you can display additional columns such as ID.

content_parts.title: Creating a purchase receipt after changing the receiving site or supplier address

content_parts.content: You can create a purchase receipt and add lines from a purchase order after modifying the receiving site or supplier address.

content_parts.title: Features
_jql: project = XT AND issuetype in (Epic, Story) AND 'X3 Release Note Status' in ('Communicated, Validated by PO/PM','Review Done') AND 'X3 Release Note Grouping' = 'Finance' AND (statusCategory in (Done) OR status = 'Release Candidate') AND (resolution is EMPTY OR resolution in (Delivered, Done)) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Epic Type' not in (Internal, Research) AND 'X3 Epic Type' = New AND fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2025 R3 (52.0.0)")

content_parts.content: Accounts receivable payment tracking improves visibility of outstanding receivables, enhances transparency, and simplifies accounts receivable management. You can record payments on sales invoices, offset payments against credit memos, and automatically mark invoices and credit memos as paid or partially paid. If you use Sage Intacct, this functionality is not available.

content_parts.title: Improvements
_jql: project = XT AND ((issuetype in (Epic, Story) AND 'X3 Release Note Status' in ('Communicated, Validated by PO/PM','Review Done') AND 'X3 Release Note Grouping' = 'Finance' AND (statusCategory in (Done) OR status = 'Release Candidate') AND (resolution is EMPTY OR resolution in (Delivered, Done)) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Epic Type' not in (Internal, Research) AND 'X3 Epic Type' = Improvement) OR (issuetype = Bug AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('To be communicated') AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('Validated by PO') AND 'X3 Product Area' = 'Finance' AND status in (Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Behaviour Change' = Yes)) AND fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2025 R3 (52.0.0)")

content_parts.title: AP and AR unbilled inquiries display amounts in company currency

content_parts.content: To ease period-end reconciliation, after you launch the Unbilled accounts payable and Unbilled accounts receivable pages, amounts display in the company currency.

Retry failed posting

You can use the Retry icon on the Posting tab to access the Notification history page when posting is unsuccessful. From there, you can resolve errors, such as missing dimensions, and easily resend or retry the posting as needed.

This enhancement applies to posting transactions for purchase returns and sales return receipts, accounts payable and accounts receivable invoices, stock transfer receipts and shipments, and work in progress postings.

View status

To see the journal posting status, the Posting tab was added to completed documents for purchase returns and sales return receipts.

content_parts.title: Unbilled accounts receivable includes shipments that are not confirmed

content_parts.content: Unbilled accounts receivable only includes shipments at Shipped status.

content_parts.title: Check component stock for a BOM

content_parts.content:
You asked. We listened.

So that you can check component stock availability quickly and easily, a Check stock action was added to the More actions icon on the Bill of material page. The image of the BOM was moved to an Information tab, so that more of the components display on the Components tab.

content_parts.title: Sales shipment stuck at Posting in progress status

content_parts.content: You can update the sales shipment status for transactions that are partially posted to stock, without error.

content_parts.title: Work orders with zero WIP cost

content_parts.content: Journal entries are not created if the work in progress cost is zero.

content_parts.title: Improvements

content_parts.content:
For a better user experience, the tenant selector in the top bar displays the names and types of the available tenants.

The following colored labels identify the tenant type:

  • A green Production label
  • A blue Demo label

Dashboards are responsive to enhance your user experience and give you better insight into your activities. Depending on the size of your screen, dashboard widgets rearrange automatically. You can add widgets to columns to customize your display.
The number of columns varies from 2 (for screens under 700 pixels) to 12 (for screens over 1,920 pixels).
The intermediate sizes are 4, 6, and 10 columns.

content_parts.title: Setting up email sender from SDMO

content_parts.content: The sysApiKey value was updated on the cluster and the containers were restarted.
The isActive switch is turned on when a metadata entry is in the code base but is off in the database.

content_parts.title: Export data from a main list

content_parts.content: A user that is not an admin user can export data from a main list.

content_parts.title: Alignment of numeric fields when editing a report template

content_parts.content: Numeric fields are aligned with text fields when editing a report template.

content_parts.title: Long text does not display in the available space

content_parts.content: An ellipsis displays when text is too long to display in full.

content_parts.title: Timeouts occur while using the product

content_parts.content: Safeguards were added to prevent unexpected timeouts.
